department.dept_long_name: Committee on Degrees in Folklore and Mythology

course.title: Chinese New Year Pictures: Folk Art and Visual Culture
course.description: The colorful woodcut prints now commonly known as New Year pictures or nianhua are one of China's best known folk arts, thriving into the 20th c. We will look at how these prints were made and distributed, the roles they played in everyday life, and what they can tell us about the interactions of high and low, rural and urban, and tradition and modernity within Chinese culture and art.
